narrative:
This was a focused inspection of the 4 dogs:  female Siberian Husky (M/C# 092811836), Scarlett (m/c#
092811344),  French Bulldog (Paris, m/c# 4A014D3004), and Sonny, King Charles Cavalier Spaniel (m/c#
0A01762555) cited under 2.40 (b) (2) on the July 29, 2014 inspection.
The dogs were evaluated by a veterinarian and treated according to the directions of the veterinarian. Documents
were available for review. 
MDA veterinarian and inspector accompanied USDA on inspection.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
